biotools.summary: mwTab is a Python library for RESTful access and enhanced quality control, deposition, and curation of the metabolomics workbench data repository. The mwtab package is a Python library that facilitates reading and writing files in mwTab format used by the Metabolomics Workbench for archival of Mass Spectrometry (MS) and Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) experimental data.
